data.comment: The big names in today's match at Arena Khimki have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Khimki.
In the minute 2, Volgograd to take a throw-in in Khimki territory.
Kirill Levnikov awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Khimki.
In the minute 3, Throw-in high up the field for Khimki in Khimki.
Corner awarded to Khimki.
Khimki's Aleksandr Troshechkin misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 4, It's a goal kick for the away team in Khimki.
Throw-in for Volgograd in their own half.
Kirill Levnikov signals a Volgograd throw-in in Khimki's half.
In the minute 9, Free kick Volgograd.
Ball safe as Khimki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Volgograd in the half of Khimki.
In the minute 10, Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Volgograd in the half of Khimki.
In the minute 14, Can Volgograd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
Volgograd have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Volgograd close to the penalty box.
In the minute 14, Can Volgograd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Khimki's half?
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
Volgograd needs to be cautious. Khimki have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 16, Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Khimki a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 18, Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Volgograd's Oleg Aleynik gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
In the minute 19, Kirill Levnikov signals a throw-in for Volgograd, close to Khimki's area.
Khimki have been awarded a corner by Kirill Levnikov.
In Khimki, Kirill Bozhenov of Khimki is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 21, Alesandr Lomovitskiy of Khimki gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
Volgograd pushes forward through Kamil Mullin, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 23, Khimki's Andrey Murnin has been booked in Khimki.
Kirill Levnikov signals a Volgograd throw-in in Khimki's half.
Khimki needs to be cautious. Volgograd have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 25, Volgograd have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Volgograd close to the penalty box.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Volgograd.
In the minute 27, Volgograd's Ilya Zhigulev gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Khimki defender.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
Kirill Levnikov awards Volgograd a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Saba Kverkvelia is booked for the away team.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Khimki to check on Artem Polyarus, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 31, Khimki’s Artem Polyarus is on his feet again at Arena Khimki.
Khimki are pushing forward but Alesandr Lomovitskiy's finish is wide of the goal.
Volgograd have a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Goal! Kamil Mullin gives Volgograd a 0-1 lead.
That's a fine assist from Danil Stepanov.
Free kick for Khimki in the half of Volgograd.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Khimki.
Khimki have been awarded a corner by Kirill Levnikov.
Throw-in high up the field for Khimki in Khimki.
In the minute 38, Khimki have been awarded a corner by Kirill Levnikov.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Kirill Bozhenov (Khimki) has received a yellow card from Kirill Levnikov.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Can Volgograd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Khimki's half?
In the minute 43, Volgograd are coming forward and Sergey Makarov gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
Volgograd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Volgograd.
Corner awarded to Volgograd.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Volgograd are in shooting range from this free kick.
Kirill Levnikov awards Khimki a goal kick.
Khimki have been awarded a corner by Kirill Levnikov.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half is underway at Arena Khimki.
In the minute 46, Free kick in a good position for Khimki!
Volgograd make their first substitution with Oleg Kozhemyakin replacing Armen Manucharyan.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Throw-in Volgograd.
In the minute 48, Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kirill Levnikov signals a throw-in for Khimki, close to Volgograd's area.
Khimki advance rapidly upfield but Kirill Levnikov blows for offside.
In the minute 50, Volgograd's Oleg Aleynik breaks free at Arena Khimki. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Khimki.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Cedric Gogoua.
In the minute 51, Cedric Gogoua has recovered and rejoins the match in Khimki.
Volgograd are whistled for offside.
Volgograd will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Khimki.
In the minute 53, At Arena Khimki, Azat Bairyyev has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Dmitri Tikhiy (Khimki) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Free kick Khimki.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Goal! Alesandr Lomovitskiy levels the match at 1-1.
Arshak Koryan instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 60, Khimki are coming forward and Brian Idowu gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Volgograd have a goal kick.
Kirill Levnikov signals a throw-in for Khimki, close to Volgograd's area.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Khimki in the half of Volgograd.
Maksim Martusevich is on a sub for Andrey Murnin for Khimki.
Corner awarded to Khimki.
In the minute 64, Khimki have been awarded a corner by Kirill Levnikov.
Ball safe as Volgograd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sergey Serchenkov is replacing Ilya Zhigulev for the away team.
In the minute 67, Artem Polyarus of Khimki smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Kirill Levnikov awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, Can Volgograd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
Khimki needs to be cautious. Volgograd have an attacking throw-in.
Khimki to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Volgograd.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Khimki are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 75, In Khimki a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for Volgograd at Arena Khimki.
The home team replace Kamran Aliev with Mohamed Konate.
In the minute 77, Throw-in high up the field for Khimki in Khimki.
Can Khimki capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Free kick for Khimki in the half of Volgograd.
In the minute 79, Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Khimki just outside Volgograd's area.
Artem Polyarus of Khimki gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 79, Kirill Levnikov awards Volgograd a goal kick.
Oleg Aleynik (Volgograd) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick Khimki.
Throw-in for Khimki close to the penalty box.
In the minute 81, Aleksandr Troshechkin (Khimki) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal kick for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
Brian Idowu for Khimki has been booked by Kirill Levnikov and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 83, Mohamed Konate (Khimki) gets in a shot – but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Khimki push forward at Arena Khimki and Arshak Koryan gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Volgograd defence.
Corner awarded to Khimki.
In the minute 84, Mohamed Konate for Khimki drives towards goal at Arena Khimki. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Volgograd at Arena Khimki.
Throw-in for Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 85, Khimki make their third substitution with Ilya Vorobyov replacing Arshak Koryan.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Kirill Levnikov.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Khimki in the half of Volgograd.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Khimki.
Khimki's Aleksandr Troshechkin misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 88, Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
Khimki to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
Kirill Levnikov will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Important block from the Volgograd defence as Ilya Vorobyov fires in a strike for Khimki.
Kirill Levnikov signals a Khimki throw-in in Volgograd's half.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
Aleksandr Troshechkin (Khimki) gets a yellow card.
